quick_chat.name: Quick Chat
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.quick_cha: Send messages quickly by pressing keys.
quick_chat.config.message.desc:
Set the content of the quick message to be sent

Prefix the message with "/" to execute it as a command in-game.
quick_chat.config.anti_false_contact.des: When enabled, double-click is required to send messages via quick key or quick message list in chat window to prevent accidental sending.
quick_chat.config.message_list.desc: You can add more quick messages in this screen. After entering the game, you can quickly open this screen by pressing the key binding, then send the content you want!
quick_chat.config.cooldown.desc: If turned off, cooldown duration will be set to 0.5s
quick_chat.config.cooldown_duration.desc: Set the interval for sending messages
quick_chat.config.chat_button.desc: When enabled, quick message buttons will be displayed in the chat window for quick sending.
quick_chat.config.chat_button.width.desc: Set the width of quick message buttons in the chat window.
quick_chat.gui.message_list.title: Quick Message List
quick_chat.gui.message_list.tip_empty: No messages available, please add new messages!
quick_chat.gui.message_list.tip: Select a message, you can delete, edit, or send it!
quick_chat.gui.message_list.send_not_in_: Please enter the game before using this feature!
quick_chat.gui.add_message.title: Edit Quick Message
